snippet: The government has expanded a list of recognized disabilities, angering groups who say many people face cuts because of austerity measures.
abstract: Greece expands a list of recognized disabilities to include pedophiles, exhibitionists and kleptomaniacs; action angers groups who say expanded list could create difficulties for disabled Greeks who are already facing benefit cuts because of the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: The government has expanded a list of recognized disabilities, angering groups who say many people face cuts because of austerity measures.

headline.seo: Greek Disability Groups Angered by New Categories
headline.main: Disability Expansion Raises Ire in Greece
headline.print_headline: Disability Expansion Raises Ire in Greece
